pageTitle: Still working for employer who set up insurance - %s

stillWork.label: Do you still work for the employer who set up this policy?

errors.required: Select yes if you still work for the employer who set up this policy
Enter the date this employment ended
errors.missingDay: Date employment ended must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date employment ended must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date employment ended must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date employment ended must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date employment ended must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date employment ended must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter the date this employment ended with a year in the right format, for example 2001 not 01
errors.notReal: Enter a real date this employment ended
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date this employment ended using only digits
errors.inPast: Date employment ended must not be in the future
